title: Looking for high diamond + solo laners
body:
Hello we are looking for some solo laners to participate in the next open ladder! 

We are looking for people that are willing to prac 3-4 nights a week with the team, and with decent champ pools.

If interested add jRdn in game and we can talk some more

replies.body: HELLO I AM PLAY AZIR LANE CONSIDER ME FOR A DAY I SHOW U MECHNX{{champion:268}}
